title: Who Are the Up and Comers in the Cigar Industry? - The After Show
itunes:title: Who Are the Up and Comers in the Cigar Industry? - The After Show
description:
Does the cigar industry need some fresh blood? We talk about whether there are any young cigar makers who will be the future of the industry.

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at https://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
